title: 【翻译】9月20日3.0进展报告——地图报告
author: siska
txt_content:
人工翻译
再次声明，3.0更新未开始




siska版权所有，如需转载，必须声明

原文：
Hello! 

In case you don't know, right now Unturned is going through a massive overhaul for optimizations, dedicated servers on the steam server list, VAC, workshop and overall better networking which is not currently on the public branch. 3.0 refers to said upcoming update, and 2.0 to the existing version of the game. Just to be clear: the following features are in 3.0, not 2.0. 

The test map for 3.0 is now done: 

【图在翻译那里】

The last few days I've just been polishing it a bit and working on some potential performance issues, but for the most part it's going to be what you play on. Many other things have changed from the last post as well such as hundreds of new models, proper loading screens, character options, etc. 

You can now view my to-do list on Trello[trello.com], although keep in mind that things are constantly being added/removed throughout each day as I work. Most likely the early preview branch will become available sometime next week. 

Thanks for reading!


翻译：

Hello! 
你不知道的情况下，我们正对Unturned进行着大规模的检修、优化。Steam服务器列表、VAC、创意工坊、专用服务器及其他更好的网络中的支持目前还未面向公众。这次新闻讲的内容是3.0的，不是2.0的，同时声明一下3.0还没更新。（这句话第十二次出现）

已经做好的3.0测试图的预览：








地图报告.jpg (109.65 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2014-9-20 15:42 上传








最近几天我一直在让这幅测试图更加完美，和解决一些潜在的性能方面的问题，其中我做好的大部分内容，你将会在3.0上可以玩到。其他的东西也进行了大规模调整，例如上百个新模型、新的加载画面、新的人物设置栏……

如果你想了解更多关于我接下来要做的事情，请登录Trello[trello.com]，但要知道，我做接下来要做的事情的时候，不仅可能会增加新的东西，也可能会删掉一些东西。最早的预览版本可能会在下周的某个时候诞生。


感谢你的阅读！
感谢楼主的翻译！
